name: Family Trainer 4: Jogging Race
overview: Family Trainer 4: Jogging Race is the fourth game in Bandai's Family Trainer game series for the Powerpad peripheral. The game features two game modes. The first is a training mode. You define your stats (weight, height, age) and the time or distance you want to train. The second mode is a so called marathon mode, which is divided into smaller stages of 3km. In marathon mode you must also be aware of various obstacles on your way.
